Container.Name: gimp
Container.Overview: GIMP(https://www.gimp.org/) is a free and open-source raster graphics editor used for image manipulation (retouching) and image editing, free-form drawing, transcoding between different image file formats, and more specialized tasks. It is extensible by means of plugins, and scriptable.
Container.Requires: This image is unprotected by default __**do not**__ expose it to the internet. Please read https://github.com/linuxserver/docker-gimp#security for more information.
Container.Changes:
### 2025-07-12 - Rebase to Selkies and Debian Trixie, install resynthesizer, HTTPS IS NOW REQUIRED.
### 2024-12-06 - Rebase to Alpine 3.21.
### 2024-05-23 - Rebase to Alpine 3.20.
### 2024-02-10 - Update Readme with new env vars and ingest proper PWA icon.
### 2023-12-07 - Initial Release.

Config.Name: WebUI
Config.Description: GIMP desktop gui HTTP, must be proxied.

Config.Name: Appdata
Config.Description: Users home directory in the container, stores local files and settings
